title: Winnie the Pooh and Tigger too
creator_credit: John Lounsbery, Wolfgang Reitherman and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Rambunctious Tigger bounces his way through this film, leaving a trail of laughter and enjoyment behind him. Poor Rabbit, driven to distraction by Tigger’s high spirits plot’s a “calming sort of lesson”.
creator_credit_for_label: John Lounsbery, Wolfgang Reitherman and Walt Disney Productions
